reviewText:
Only Bishop Sheen's insightful explainations of  these topics, Confession, Kenosis. the Cross, the Mass etc. can cause you to be amazed !!!
I watch many times and learn something new !
A great dvd.  Arrived sooner than expected and it is definitely one of his best.  I really enjoyed it!

First off, this is a great set of talks.
Bishop Sheen has always been able to put into simple words things that might be difficult to understand when it comes to faith.  I highly recommend this set because it's as relevant today as it was then.
it was awesome as only he can be

I bought this DVD as a gift for a family member but ended up borrowing and I am glad I did. Bishop Sheen was an exceptional speaker who possessed a vast knowledge on the true Catholic faith. Bishop Sheen continues to inspire a love of Jesus, Mary and Joseph through DVDs such as this one. Interestingly, in a couple of the segments, Bishop Sheen warns of problems beginning within the Church due to priests and bishops focusing on social justice issues, instead of divine matters. If you are seeking knowledge of true Roman Catholic teachings, get this DVD!
